title: High Ping after Patches 7.21
body: I have been having high ping around 300-500. I usually have around 72 ping, but after this patch, it spiked up. I don't know whats happening, riot please fix

replies.body: I wanna first try adjusting a couple network settings to see if we can get that ping to drop a bit before diving too deep into this. Check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the two steps on Port Forwarding and DNS settings. Give those a tweak, and test it in a custom game to let me know how that goes.

Ive tried this stuff. No luck. Ive heard from 30+ dutch people (also some friends) which most of them have KPN as ISP. I also have KPN, And i can't even log in properly, the emote popup keeps coming up, and its so slow that you can't even send an invite to someone.

No worries, this still helps to narrow down what the main problem is for us all. 

You mentioned hearing from those around you that they're having issues getting connected with the same ISP as well? I'm curious if they might be having some troubles on their end, so let's try running a quick traceroute to see what that connection looks like after it leaves your network. 

Use something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to the EUW servers at 192.64.170.252 and post a screenshot here using something like Gyazo.

https://nyanyanya.moe/c5c9e0.png

https://nyanyanya.moe/ae5a6a.png

https://nyanyanya.moe/597833.png

Here are some screenshots.

So for reference here.....

https://i.gyazo.com/dce8bcabc006f6c281b6a7a79c460745.png

that line there is when your connection hits your ISP, and that 50% in the Loss column is showing 50% packet loss. Basically, that means at least *half* of your connection got corrupted as soon as it hit your ISP. I'd strongly suggest reaching out to them with this proof to show them that there is a problem somewhere.

For me, it seems weird but I took my game out of Fullscreen mode to Borderless Window and for some reason, I have not had any ping spikes larger than 125ms.  My characters don't teleport anymore and I don't get any of the 3,000-5,000 crazy numbers that I used to.  Maybe that's a coincidence since it doesn't seem logical that resolution would affect ping, but *shrug*.  It seemed to somehow help me. Maybe it'll luck out for you too? GLHF 

EDIT:  My FPS stayed the same between Fullscreen and Borderless Window at a constant 90-100+ on a laptop.  Yes, I know the difference between FPS and ping, thank you kindly.  :)

I have this problem, too. My ping is normally around 30-40 but after the patch, it's jumped up to 500-600 and hangs around 100-300 more often. I guess the ping wouldn't have bothered me if it stayed around 100, but it keeps jumping from 30 to 100 to 500, which really messes me up in games.
